    • isOnline

      @GetMapping("/isOnline") @ResponseBody public String isOnline​(@RequestParam("Id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws org.json.JSONException
      Checks if the user is still connected, by checking if the user send a fetch request in the last 10 seconds. the function is also checks if there is new messages.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the last currently message of the user screen.
      model - Model
      Returns:
      true if is the last message in database, false, else.
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - Exception

    • insertUser

      Insert new user to database
      Parameters:
      user - User
      message - Message
      result - to check errors
      model - Model
      Returns:
      the chatroom page

      Parameters:
      message - message
      result - to check errors
      model - for thymeleaf in the html
      Returns:
      "ok",if the succeed
